text: Leonard Józef Pietraszak (6 November 1936 — 1 February 2023) was a Polish actor. He appeared in more than 60 movies and television shows since 1957. He was born in Bydgoszcz, Poland. He is known for his role in the comedy television series Czterdziestolatek. Pietraszak also starred in Stawka większa niż życie (1967), How I Unleashed World War II (1970), Vabank (1981), Danton (1983), Kingsajz (1987) and Letters to Santa (2011). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors
title: Leonard Pietraszak
